title: Annual Book Fair
description: A captivating and bustling book fair featuring thousands of books from international and local publishers.

title: Big Trade Show 2024
description: Explore the latest trends in commerce and tech at our annual trade show, bringing together industry leaders and innovators.

title: Technology Expo
description: Join the largest gathering of tech enthusiasts, developers, and entrepreneurs at this year's premier technology exposition.

title: Spring Art Expo
description: A diverse collection of contemporary art from the most vibrant artists in South Asia. Engage with art in new ways and purchase original artworks.

title: International Commerce Expo
description: An international platform for businesses to showcase their latest products and services, network with industry peers, and discover global market trends.

title: National Book Festival
description: Celebrate literature and literacy with us at the National Book Festival, featuring bestselling authors, booksellers, and thousands of readers.
